text: Christos Zechouritis, also spelled Khristos Zekhouritis, was a Greek track and field athlete who competed in the 1904 Summer Olympics in the marathon. He finished eleventh of the fifteen finishers, but moved up to tenth after Frederick Lorz was disqualified. == See also == * Greece at the 1904 Summer Olympics == References == * Category:Greek male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Greece Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Christos Zechouritis
